title: Buy financials on a pull-back, says Vespula Capital's Jeff Tomasulo
text:
Buy financials on a pull-back, says Vespula Capital's Jeff Tomasulo 6:47am IST - 04:02 
It's easier to score a bargain in this volatile environment, says Jeff Tomasulo, CEO and founder of Vespula Capital. He adds that all-times highs for stocks is over because of rising interest rates, higher inflation, and a weaker dollar.
